name: llama-gpu
description: Node.js tooling, scripts, pre-commit hooks, and future frontend/server support for LLaMA-GPU project (linting, formatting, docs, integration). Current phase: dependency & environment management. Planned: multi-platform CI/CD, automated docs, security audit, analytics integration. All changes and test outputs are logged in logs/. Code is modular, maintainable, and well-documented.

scripts.test: echo 'No JS tests yet' > logs/test_output.log && echo 'Test output logged.'
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format
